custom-action.name: imported_rfc_execute
custom-action.description:
Executes an RFC function.
Parameters: - destination: Name of the destination to use. - remoteFunction: Name of the function to execute. - importParameters: Import parameter names and values. Use , to separate parameters and : to separate names and values. Example: name1:value1,name2:value2. - tableParameters: Table parameter names and values. Use , to separate parameters and : to separate names and values. Example: name1:value1,name2:value2.
